content: out of yarn by audrey bochantin materials yarn 10 yards ~4 5 meters in each of 3 colors a total of 30 yards 27 5 meters of worsted wt yarn any yarn can be used as long as you use needles slightly smaller than recommended for that yarn weight needles a set of 4 us size 3 3 25mm dpns gauge not important although you want to keep the knitting close other stitch holder or waste yarn blunt point tapestry needle notes on this pattern i tied the yarn ends as i went once you are near the end it is difficult to turn the work inside out to do it then there will be no need to weave them in but you may if you want often you may need to adjust the needles which is why i used the dpns for the pattern also numbering the sections is very helpful abbreviations used k=knit p=purl sl=slip_stitch slip purl wise k2tog tbl=knit 2 together in the back loops p2tog=purl 2 together pattern & images © 2010 by audrey bochantin contact apatterns@gmail com section 1 using color a use a provisional cast on or judy s magic cast on to make 10 on each needle r1 knit r2 sl1 p9 r3 sl1 k9 repeat row 2 & 3 until you have 21 row ending on a knit row section 2 using color b pick up 10 stitches knit wise along left edge of section 1 r1 sl1 p9 r2 sl1 k9 repeat row 1 & 2 until you have 20 row ending on a knit row pattern & images © 2010 by audrey bochantin contact apatterns@gmail com section 3 using color c pick up 10 stitches knit wise along left edge of section 2 place stitches from holder onto needle r1 sl1 p9 r2 sl1 k8 k2tog tbl repeat row 1 and 2 ending on a knit row until you have joined all of section 1 20 row you will be joining sections 3 and 1 together pattern & images © 2010 by audrey bochantin contact apatterns@gmail com section 4 using color b pick up 10 stitches knit wise along side of section 1 r1 sl1 p8 p2tog r2 sl1 k9 you will be joining sections 3 and 4 repeat row 1 and 2 ending on a purl row until you have joined all of section 3 19 row section 5 using color a pick up stitches purl wise along side of section 3 r1 sl1 k8 k2tog tbl r2 sl1 p8 p2tog you will be joining sections 2 4 &5 repeat row 1 and 2 ending in a purl row until you have joined the 3 sections together 20 row section 6 using color c pick up stitches purl wise along side of section 2 r1 sl1 k8 k2tog tbl r2 sl1 p8 p2tog you will be joining sections 1 2 &5 repeat row 1 and 2 ending in a purl row until you have joined the 3 sections together
